description.narrative: UNICEF supported an integrated UN response to floods in Conakry, Kankan and N'Zérékoré and landslide in Conakry, thus improving the resilience of 300 families (2,500 people, including 1,360 children) in the affected areas. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:13/12/2017
